name: Promotion Class: Dirge
description:
Role: Melee Control

Heavily armored and control focused, this master of the foil is not to be trifled with.

Stat Adjustments:
Health +1050
Self Healing +4.5%
Final Mitigations +25%

Traits Granted:
Pistol Mastery
Rapier Mastery
Mail Armor Proficiency
Plate Armor Proficiency

Enhancements:
Pepperbox Shot: Now reduces targets Piercing Mitigation on 5 pips spent.
Keen Guard: Now Heals on activation that scales with pips and has a reduced cooldown.
Flintlock Shot: Now has increased damage against Bleeding targets.


WARNING: Purchasing this talent promotes you to the Dirge  promotion class and prevents access to the Vanguard Scout  and Slayer promotion classes.
